blood_lash.name: Blood Lash
blood_lash.description: A whip of blood tears into the foe, fueled by the caster's life.

fate_whisper.name: Fate Whisper
fate_whisper.description: A vision grants an ally fleeting protection.

shadow_bind.name: Shadow Bind
shadow_bind.description: Tendrils from the Veil immobilize foe, but caster feels phantom restraints.

decay_touch.name: Decay Touch
decay_touch.description: Wither flesh on contact, caster's skin cracks and ages prematurely.

veil_echo.name: Veil Echo
veil_echo.description: Whispers from beyond induce terror, caster hears endless echoes in mind.

soul_leech.name: Soul Leech
soul_leech.description: Drain life to heal self, but invites Veil entities to possess caster.
